Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Ashburn in 1982...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1984, off Fredrick Nottingham (HAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/21/1984, off Larry Birmingham (CC)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1984, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...

Won Slick Fielder Award at Leftfield in 1985...
Won World Championship with Ashburn in 1987...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1989, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
